title: Stade Raymond Kopa, Angers, eventseeker
snippet: Stade Raymond Kopa, originally known as Le Stade Jean-Bouin, is a football stadium and home to the local club, Angers SCO. It plays host to a bevy of football matches that attract hordes of fans from Angers and around.

title: Stade Raymond Kopa Tickets and Upcoming Events | SeatPick
snippet: Capable of hosting 17,835 fans, Stade Raymond Kopa is the home of Angers SCO and is located in Angers, France.

title: Stade Raymond Kopa Map - Stadium - Angers, Pays de la Loire, France
snippet: Stade Raymond Kopa is a football stadium in Angers, France. It is the home ground of Ligue 1 side Angers SCO and seats 19,800 people.
